name: Consulta della Professioni - Confederazione Generale Italiana del Lavoro
goal:
Consulta delle Professioni is the place where CGIL meets professional associacions.
Its mission is to make CGIL know about professional and self employed conditions.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Culture, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Regulation of profession
CES meetings to discover other national experiences
